mapper.sql: speechcraft_type_detail_id AS "speechcraftTypeDetailId", name AS "name", speechcraft_type_id AS "speechcraftTypeId", sort AS "sort", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_crm_speechcraft_type_detail where 1 = 1
and speechcraft_type_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeDetailId},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and speechcraft_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeId},'%')
and sort like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sort},'%')
order by create_time DESC
